desc: Adds chance of absorbing HP when attacking

dictionary.lore: It's been told that this spear eats peoples' souls. Knights thought of it as wicked, none daring to take it for their own. Then one day, a traveling knight, dressed in black armor, tried carrying it away. As those around him tried to stop him, the black knight spoke, "This spear is like me. No one knows the power it holds. That is why I am taking it."

name: Drain Spear
